revisionDesc.change: Finalized - ready. R. W. Daniel, _Architectural Orientation in the Papyri_ pp. 177-82. has not been included.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - 1. delete $m1; => ἡ̣γ̣ε̣[μονίας] 6 -7: => 6. [.?] <:[ τόπον ἀπὸ οἰκία]ς̣ ὅ̣λη̣ς̣ ἀ̣ν̣[εῳγμένης εἰς ] <:[.?] [ἀπὸ(?)][ οἰ]κίας7. [ὁλοκλήρου]=BL 10.54|ed|[.?].5 7. [.?]:> 9. => <#ἕνα=1#> 14, 17, 18, 20, 27, 28: fix num tag 21: ἔτους => ἐνιαυτοῦ 22: => <#α=1#> 23: => <:[Αὐρήλιος][ ca.8].1|alt|[Φλάουιος][ ca.9].1:> 24: delete second [ὁ προγεγραμμένος] 26: corr => reg 27: => νομ 28: corr => reg; => <:πρό̣κειται|reg|πρό̣κιται:>
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/cpr;14;12' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;26;16734'
Emended CPR XIV 12 from SB XXVI 16734 and BL X 54 (overlooked at Marburg).
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
